headline: Mastercard and Visa’s Proposed Settlement Might Change the Case for Investing in MA
summary: Earlier this month, Mastercard and Visa announced a proposed settlement to resolve longstanding multidistrict antitrust litigation with U.S. merchants, introducing changes such as lower and capped interchange fees, expanded merchant surcharging options, and greater flexibility in credit card acceptance rules. This settlement, which is still subject to court approval, is set to provide merchants across the U.S. with increased clarity and options regarding payment acceptance, while addressing...
